body_html: No one's looked at it yet. Since it is blocking you I can try to take a look sometime. I'm not sure if it is worth exploring work-arounds; the graph fuser will try to fuse as many scalar tensor ops as it can, triggering the assert when the graph is interpreted in at runtime.

body: No one's looked at it yet. Since it is blocking you I can try to take a look sometime. I'm not sure if it is worth exploring work-arounds; the graph fuser will try to fuse as many scalar tensor ops as it can, triggering the assert when the graph is interpreted in at runtime.
